ygData.subject: Re: Dizziness n EQ...
ygData.msgSnippet: sure Entereri... or Nalfien.... if i do get online... ill certainly be online during those hours... :) usually ill play round from 7am - 7pm (Singapore
ygData.messageBody:
sure Entereri... or Nalfien.... if i do get online... ill certainly be
online during those hours... :)
usually ill play round from 7am - 7pm (Singapore Time)...

Nicademous
p/s: so i can use a tell or something?

> >xp
> >> >> from

> >> >> > stage
